responseSchema.title: API#1523 Get Calculation Details Success Response Schema
responseSchema.description: API#1523 Get Calculation Details Success Response Schema

metadata.title: metadata
metadata.description: An object representing the metadata for the calculation.

calculationId.description: The Id of the calculation. This is either 8 digit value with leading zeros (legacy calculation ID) or a UUID from April 2018. The regex ensures that all calculation IDs end in the tax year and NINO identifier, which is the format for internal purposes.

taxYear.description: Tax year format YYYY.  2018 relates to Tax Year 2017-2018

requestedBy.title: Requester
requestedBy.description: The requester of the calculation between a customer/agent generated request and a calculation due to an hmrc event requiring a new calculation. Currently agent will default to customer until it can be supported

requestedTimestamp.description: The date and time the calculator received the request to perform a calculation.

calculationReason.description: The reason why the calculation was triggered.

calculationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the calculation was performed

calculationType.description: The type of calculation being performed

intentToCrystallise.description: True or False flag on whether the calculation is for the purpose of crystallisation

crystallised.description: Flag set to true when this calculation has been crystallised

crystallisationTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the crystallisation was performed

periodFrom.description: This defines the earliest point from which the calculation was performed. This will be the Accounting period start date (for self-employments) or the tax year start date. Whichever occurs first for the income sources supplied

periodTo.description: This defines the latest point to which the calculation was performed and will be the point  in the year to which income has been submitted

inputs.description: An object representing the input data supplied for use in this calculation

personalInformation.title: personalInformation
personalInformation.description: The personal information about the customer.

identifier.description: Identifies the taxpayer for whom the calculation was performed

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the taxpayer. Used e.g. for validation of class 4 exemption

taxRegime.description: The tax regime which applies to this calculation

statePensionAgeDate.description: The date the taxpayer qualifies for state pension.

marriageAllowance.description: A signal whether the customer has transferred out their allowance or received an allowance.

uniqueTaxpayerReference.description: The Unique Taxpayer Reference for the customer

incomeSources.title: income-sources
incomeSources.description: The income sources used in this calculation

businessIncomeSources.description: List of  business income sources used in this calculation

incomeSourceId.title: 15 Char Id
incomeSourceId.description: The unique identifier of the income source

incomeSourceName.description: The name of the income source

accountingPeriodStartDate.description: The accounting start date of the income source

accountingPeriodEndDate.description: The accounting end date of the income source

source.description: The source of the income data used in this calculation

latestPeriodEndDate.description: The date which income has been submitted up to for the income source. E.g From start date up to this date

latestReceivedDateTime.description: The latest date & time when this income source had data submitted against it.

finalised.description: Boolean on whether the income source is finalised

finalisationTimestamp.description: The finalisation timestamp of the income source

submissionPeriods.title: submissionPeriods
submissionPeriods.description: The submission periods for the income source.

periodId.description: A reference to the unique identifier of the period in the source system.

startDate.description: The start date of the period in the source system

endDate.description: The end date of the period in the source system.

receivedDateTime.description: The timestamp when the income data was received by the source

nonBusinessIncomeSources.description: List of non business income sources used in this calculation

oneOf.title: 15 Char Id
oneOf.description: The unique identifier of the income source

oneOf.title: CGT-PPD
oneOf.description: The unique identifier of the CGT submission.

incomeSourceType.description:
Non Business income source types. 
 * 05 - Employments 
 * 07 - Foreign Dividends 
 * 09 - UK Savings And Gains (BBSI) 
 * 10 - Dividends 
 * 11 - State Benefits 
 * 12 - Share Schemes 
 * 16 - Foreign SavingsAndGains 
 * 17 - Other Dividends (stocks, redemption etc) 
 * 18 - UK securities 
 * 19 - Other Income 
 * 20 - Foreign Pension 
 * 21 - NonPayeIncome 
*22 - CGT 
* 98 - Char Giving

incomeSourceName.description: The name of the income source

startDate.description: The start date of the income source.  For non business incomes this aligns to the tax year

endDate.description: The end date of the income source. For non business incomes this aligns to the tax year

source.description: The source of the income data used in this calculation

periodId.description: A reference to the unique identifier of the annual submission in the source system

latestReceivedDateTime.description: The date-time when the latest income data was received by the source. This field may not be present for Employments when no pay data has been received.

annualAdjustments.description: An object holding the annual adjustments for income sources.

incomeSourceId.title: 15 Char Id
incomeSourceId.description: The unique identifier of the income source

receivedDateTime.description: The latest date of when the adjustment was created.

applied.description: Boolean on whether the adjustment has been applied to this calculation.

lossesBroughtForward.description: List of losses that have been brought forward into this calculation.

lossId.description: The unique identifier of the loss which the customer declared when joining MTD.

incomeSourceId.title: 15 Char Id
incomeSourceId.description: The unique identifier of the income source

incomeSourceType.description: The income source type on which the loss was made

submissionTimestamp.description: The date the loss was recorded in MTD

taxYearLossIncurred.description: The tax year that the loss was incurred.

currentLossValue.description: The current value of the loss.

mtdLoss.description: Indicates whether the loss was registered by the taxpayer on joining MTD. Only returned when False.

claims.description: The claims that will be applied in this calculation for any brought forward losses or losses arising in this calculation.

claimId.description: The unique id of the claim made by the taxpayer.

originatingClaimId.description: The unique id of the claim made by the taxpayer that resulted in this claim.
